EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.Amsterdam Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending SpringOne Tour 2019 in Amsterdam!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, It was great to see you in Amsterdam at SpringOne Tour. If you want the presentation content you will find it here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-amsterdam-2019]]>. If you enjoyed the event you can also schedule an onsite workshop <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> for your organization. And be sure to join us this October in Austin, Texas for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>, the biggest cloud-native Java conference in the world. Sign up now for a full day of pre-conference training, Spring Professional Certification <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/schedule]]> and the opportunity to connect with Spring community leaders. Get $200 off your SpringOne Platform ticket by using the code Attendee_SpringOneTour_200 when you register. In the meantime, host your Java/Spring app on Pivotal Web Services <[[https://run.pivotal.io/spring/]]> with a $87 trial credit. I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
